pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Likelihood Estimation of a log-Concave Density Based on Censored Data // Based on right or interval censored data, compute the maximum likelihood estimator of a (sub)probability density under the assumption that it is log-concave. For further information see Duembgen, Rufibach and Schuhmacher (2014) doi:10.1214/14-EJS930.
